Plot: .One fatal mistake changes Tilly and Linc’s lives forever. After the tragedy, Linc and his family fled a town they were no longer welcome in. Still grieving the death of her brother, Tilly’s world is rocked again when, three years later, Lincoln Reid has to come home. Linc tries to stay away from Tilly, but once he sees her fighting feelings for him, he can’t stay in the shadows.
